channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report X-2023101273
item.description:
Report X-2023101273

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: SOUTH BURLINGTON
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was on the final stretch of the conveyor belt when Line Manager discovered it was leaking. QA was called and quickly shut the belt down, containing the package in a red hazmat bin. Operations continued normally afterwards. DescribePack: The closure of the content was bent, which caused powder to leak from package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in a red hazmat bin with a plastic bag for the powder.
